name: Lie Detectors
membership: Lie Detectors is an academic partner of the First Draft News network and is a collaborative partner of the European Centre for Press and Media Freedom and EAVI Literacy for Citizenship.
goal: Lie Detectors works to improve news literacy, increase awareness of misinformation and further the general public's understanding of the mainstream media industry. It promotes positive and non-political contact between young people and journalists. Its long-term position is that news literacy should become an integral part of teacher-training colleges across Europe, so that news literacy can become one of the basic literacies of children in Europe.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Education, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
High Level Expert Group on Fake News
EU contribution to OECD work programme on education/PISA standards
